product.cushioning: Responsive rebound with shock absorption for a dynamic, cushioned feel.
product.breathability: High, designed with breathable materials for running.
product.short_description: Energize your run with the Reebok Unisex-Adult Zig Dynamica Str, a shoe designed to deliver a dynamic and responsive ride. The standout feature of the Zig Dynamica is its namesake Zig Tech sole, an innovative, zigzag-shaped midsole engineered to provide responsive rebound with every step. This unique design absorbs shock upon impact and returns energy to your stride, creating a propulsive, springy sensation that helps keep you moving forward with less fatigue. The upper is constructed from a breathable mesh material that promotes airflow to keep your feet cool and comfortable during your workout. A supportive midfoot cage ensures a secure, locked-in fit, while the durable outsole provides reliable traction on various surfaces. Whether you're hitting the pavement for a daily run or logging miles on the treadmill, the Reebok Zig Dynamica Str offers a unique and effective combination of cushioning, energy return, and breathable comfort for a truly energized run.
product.about_this_item: Enhance your running performance with superior comfort and support. Designed for trail and road running with durable traction, shock absorption, sleek design, and all-day comfort protection.
product.primary_keyword: reebok white unisex trail running shoes
